content.text:
You are playing a collaborative word guessing game in which you have to describe a target word for another player to guess.

Rules:
(a) You have to reply in the form: CLUE: <some text>. Guesses from the other player will start with GUESS.
(b) You cannot use the target word itself, parts or morphological variants of it in your description.
(c) In addition, the same rules apply for related words which are provided below.

End conditions:
(i) If you use the target word or a related word in your description, then you lose.
(ii) If the other player can guess the target word in 3 tries, you both win.

Let us start.

This is the target word that you need to describe and that the other player needs to guess:

half

Related words are:

- football
- basketball
- part

Important: You are under time pressure, give short descriptions that are to the point!

content.thinking:
I need to provide a clue for the target word "half" without using any of the following words:
- "half" (target word)
- "football" (related word)
- "basketball" (related word)
- "part" (related word)

I also need to avoid morphological variants of these words (like "halves", "halving", "partial", etc.)

Let me think about clues I could give:
1. "Half" refers to 50% of something or dividing something into two equal portions
2. It can refer to a time period in some sports games
3. It can be used in fractions (like "one-half")
4. It can refer to 50% in general

Good clues might be:
- "When you divide something into two equal sections"
- "50% of a whole"
- "One of two equal portions"
- "The intermission in some games separates the first and second of these"

I need to be careful not to use "part" or any sports references like "football" or "basketball" in my clue.

I'll go with a simple, direct clue about dividing something into two equal portions, focusing on the mathematical/proportional meaning.

content.text: CLUE: When you divide something into two equal sections, or 50% of a whole.

clem_player.response: CLUE: When you divide something into two equal sections, or 50% of a whole.

content.text:
You are playing a collaborative word guessing game in which you have to guess a target word that another player describes to you.

You can make one guess at each trial. You win when you guess the target word. You lose when you cannot guess it in 3 tries.

After each trial you will get a new hint from the other player which starts with CLUE.

Make your guesses by just saying the word using the following form: GUESS: <a word>

Let us start.


CLUE: When you divide something into two equal sections, or 50% of a whole.

content.thinking:
The clue describes something that has to do with dividing something into two equal sections, or 50% of a whole. Let me think about words that mean this:

- Half: This is the most direct word for 50% of a whole or one of two equal parts.
- Bisect: To cut or divide into two equal parts.
- Halve: To divide into two equal parts.
- Midpoint: The point that divides something into two equal parts.
- Middle: The point equally distant from all sides.
- Median: The middle value in a set of values.

Among these options, "half" seems the most likely since it directly corresponds to "50% of a whole" and "two equal sections." It's a common word that precisely fits the clue.

So my first guess will be "half".

content.text:
I need to guess the word based on the clue: "When you divide something into two equal sections, or 50% of a whole."

This sounds like it's describing a word that means one of two equal parts.

GUESS: half

This sounds like it's describing a word that means one of two equal parts.

GUESS: half
